select ga.id, ga.group_id, ga.sender_id, ga.content, ga.type, ga.attachment_url, ga.is_pinned, ga.status, ga.create_time, ga.update_time, ga.expire_time, u.nickname as sender_name, g.name as group_name from im_group_announcement ga left join im_user u on ga.sender_id = u.id left join im_group g on ga.group_id = g.id
mapper.select: where ga.group_id = #{groupId} and ga.status = 1 and (ga.expire_time is null or ga.expire_time > now()) order by ga.is_pinned desc, ga.create_time desc
where ga.group_id = #{groupId} and ga.is_pinned = 1 and ga.status = 1 order by ga.create_time desc
select count(*) from im_group_announcement where group_id = #{groupId} and status = 1
